column5: Wanted to get a couple of spare spools for spinning reels for the winter season... Where would it be easiest to get them? I hear Shimano in Peterborough doesn't carry parts. Thanks guys,

I stopped by the Shimano shop in Peterborough and they sold me a spare spool for my Sedona.  They had a second hand one on hand that looked like new to me.  Stop by and talk to them if you're in the area.
If you want to try online heres a link..... https://fishshop.shimano.com/vip/landing.jsp?link=home I have not used it but they list all parts and prices when you click on the reel you need parts for.
What are you looking for? I have some laying around mostly 2000s from  Symetre's, Sustains, and i know i have 3 from 2500 Stella's just need to locate them
Spare spool for a stradic ci4+ 2500. Thanks for the tips!
